children.text:
Version 8.3 
• Support for Samsung Galaxy S8 and LG G6 
• Improvements and bug fixes 
 
Version 8.2.1 
• Bug fixes 
•• Please update Google Play services if app still crashes: 
•• https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.gms 
 
Version 8.2 
• Text-to-Speech has been added: press on the picture to hear the caption 
•• it can be switched off in Settings 
•• for low end phones it is disabled by default as it might cause lagging 
• Eagle eye works with long click from now on 
• More beautiful user interface with rounded graphics 
• Improvements for reliability and speed 
 
Version 8.1.1 
• Bugfix for prevent crash 
 
Version 8.1 
• Screen auto dim after 3 minutes of inactivity (to avoid battery drain if you leave app running accidentally) 
• Built for Android 7.0 (Nougat) 
• Android library updates 
 
Version 8.0 
• Spanish language is now available. Translation has been made by Omar González and Adela Lagos 
• Automatic theme: 8-20 -> Light, 20-8 -> Black 
 
Version 7.1 
• Three new knots for eyed hooks: Fisherman's knot 1, Fisherman's knot 2 and Lefty's knot [Eyed Hooks 2] 
• These knots are useful for eyed hooks, flies and lures as well. All knots shown here are connected to the hook by a loop so our bait presentation will be more lifelike. 
 
Version 7.0 
• Now German and Italian languages are also available, thanks to Marco Romagnoli 
• From now on the required minimum android version is 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) 
• Android library updates 
• Bug fixes 
 
Version 6.0 
• Brand new chapter: Sea knots: *8* very strong and reliable connections used by fisherman for sea fishing 
••• 3x Dropper loops 
••• Thumb knot 
••• Marshall knot 
••• Knot for trolling 
••• Spider knot 
••• Bimini twist 
• Android library updates 
• Code optimalization 
• Few full-screen ads 
 
Version 5.3.1 & 5.3.2 
• Bug fixes 
• Android library updates 
 
Version 5.3 
• Two new loop knots: Alpin and Linfit 
 
Version 5.2 
• Share the app with your friends: Options -> Share... 
• Two permissions added as lack of those can make crash on some phones 
 
Version 5.1 
• New theme: light 
• Menu -> Theme 
 
Version 5.0 
• New feature: Ads can be removed by purchase: Menu -> Remove Ads 
• Code optimalization 
 
Version 4.2 
• Three new universal knots: Rebeck, Kentauri, Pitzen [Misc knots] 
 
Version 4.1.1 
• Bugfix to prevent crash in Needle knot's Eagle-eye view 
 
Version 4.1 
• Support for Android 5.0 (Lollipop) 
• Bugfix for Dropshot Eagle-eye view to prevent crash 
• Smooth horizontal sliding tab indicator 
• Stability improvements 
 
Version 4.0 
• New feature: Favorites 
• Boating knots are expanded 
• Lots of code and memory consumption optimization 
 
Version 3.4 
• Menu -> Language 
• WF knot 
• Number of knots: 42 
 
Version 3.3 
• Hungarian translation added 
• Layout fixes 
 
Version 3.2 
• New chapter: 'Boating knots' includes 6 knots, which present how a boat can be docked and secured: bowline, anchor knot, sliding knot, double hitch, cleat knot and clove hitch 
• Layout improvements 
• Number of knots: 41 
 
Version 3.1.1 
• Menu -> 'Eagle Eye settings': caption text size and type can be set 
• Menu -> 'Change log' added 
• Possible to go back to main screen from any chapter by clicking the icon on the left upper corner 
 
Version 3.1 
Eagle eye mode: 
Click on any picture to get a new view. This is especially useful for people with vision problems. 
• One click: show/hide caption 
• Two clicks: zoom 
• Two fingers: pinch zoom 
• Works for all modes: phone/tablet, portrait/landscape 
 
Version 3.0 
Brand new interface: 
• Swiping has been implemented 
• Much better user experience during navigation 
• Requires minimum Android version 3.0 (Honeycomb) 
 
Version 2.0 
• Massive layout improvements: 
• • Tablet (v3.2+) support: both landscape and portrait mode 
• • Phone: landscape support added 
• • Numbering added to the pictures 
 
Version 1.6 
• Memory usage optimalization to prevent force closes on some devices 
• Layout fixes 
• Android v2.2 is not supported anymore 
 
Version 1.5 
• Rapala knot 
 
Version 1.4 
• 3 Arbour knots 
• Splash screen 
• Apk size optimalized 
 
Version 1.3 
• Palomar knot 
 
Version 1.2 
• Drop shot knot 
 
Version 1.1 
• Line to line chapter, which demonstrates 3 different knots: Albright, Blood and Fishermans knot 
 
Version 1.0 
• First release
